definition: to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: But as to your other objection, I am afraid it will hardly hold good.
sentences.chinese: 但是你說的另外一點，我恐怕不大靠得住。

sentences.english: Mr. Zheng is a man to be depended on.
sentences.chinese: 鄭先生是一位靠得住的人。

sentences.english: Your health insurance ought to be there for you when it counts – and reform will make sure it is.
sentences.chinese: 改革將確保在你需要它的時候，保險能夠靠得住。

definition: easy to use/to function well/so that/in order to
